introduction: SYNOPSISHa-rim looks after her sick husband with devotion but he abuses her and she is forced to sign divorce papers. She becomes lost with sadness and unrequited love for her ex-husband until she meets Yun-gu on a train. Yun-gu also seeks true love from her. But when she learns that her husband treated her that way so she would leave and start a new life, she bids a sad farewell to Yun-gu.故事哈林照顾需要照顾的丈夫，并因丈夫的虐待而对医生无法获得的离婚领域加盖印章。在远离她对丈夫的热爱之后，曾在火车上遇到她的Yungra从一个年轻人中获得了一份安慰和生命的热情。另外，永固要真诚地爱哈林。然而，哈林发现丈夫的行为不是一种仇恨，而是一种深深的爱，她将开创她的新生活。Harim和Yoon-gu在一个地方城市的平台上组织他们的感情和分手。
